definitions.definition: A literary , artistic , and social movement that focuses on community , sustainability , technology powered by renewable energy , and a free and egalitarian society.
A supporter of the solarpunk movement .

main_definition: ( uncountable ) A literary , artistic , and social movement that focuses on community , sustainability , technology powered by renewable energy , and a free and egalitarian society.
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) A supporter of the solarpunk movement .
